sentences.sContent: There’s a short poem at the beginning of every chapter.
sentences.sCn: 每一章的开头都有一首短诗。

sentences.sContent: From the beginning of my career as a journalist, I’ve been writing about gender issues.
sentences.sCn: 从我一开始干记者这一行，我就写性别议题的题材。

sentences.sContent: I thought he loved me; perhaps he did in the beginning .
sentences.sCn: 我以为他爱我，也许开始时他确实是爱我的。

sentences.sContent: That chance meeting marked the beginning of a long and happy relationship.
sentences.sCn: 那次邂逅展开了一段长久而幸福的关系。

sentences.sContent: This is just the beginning of a new and different life for you.
sentences.sCn: 这只是你新的别样生活的开始。

sentences.sContent: I said he would cause trouble, right from the beginning .
sentences.sCn: 我一开始就说过，他会惹事。

sentences.sContent: I opposed it from the very beginning .
The whole trip was a disaster from beginning to end .
sentences.sCn: 旅途从头到尾都在出乱子。

sentences.sContent: I feel like I’ve been offered a new beginning .
sentences.sCn: 我感觉好像有了一个重新开始的机会。

sentences.sContent: Could we start at the beginning ? Tell me where you first met him.
sentences.sCn: 我们从头讲起好吗？告诉我，你是在哪里认识他的？

phrases.pCn: 首先；从一开始；起初；从头开始
从一开始；从开始到现在；从开始一直
最初；就在刚刚开始；在刚开始的时候；起初；在一开始

trans.tranOther: the start or first part of an event, story, period of time etc
